duruthu pohoya (janawari) uruwel kassapa, nadi kassapa, gaya kassapa yana thun ba jatilayan pawadiwima budurajanan wahansege prathama lankagamana (buddhathwayen 9 weni masaye mahiyanganayata) sumana saman dewiyan margapala labaganima shri lankawe prathama dagaba idikirima (mahiyangana chaithyaya) nawam pohoya (pebarawari) prathama sangha sammelanaya pawathwima sariyuth mugalan denamata agasaw thanathuru pradanaya kirima oowada prathimokshaya (bhikshunta adala winaya malawa) deshana kirima budurajananwahanse aayu sanskaraya athaharima (parinirwanayata themasakata pera piriniwanpana dinaya thiranaya kirima) madin pohoya (marthu) budurajananwahanse 20000k pamana bhikshun samanga kimbaulwath nuwarata wadama kirima sandaha pitathwima bak pohoya (aprel) siduhathkumaru sathara peranimithi dakime palamu dinaya budurajananwahansege dewana lankagamana (buddhathwayen 5 weni wasare nagadipayata) manik putuwa thanpath kara nagadipa chaithyaya pihituwima maniakkhika naraju wisin nawatha warak lakdiwata wadina lesa budurajananwahanseta aaradhana kirima wesak pohoya (mayi) sumeda thapasathuma dipankara buduradungen niyatha wiwarana ganima themangula (siduhath kumaroppaththiya, buduwima, piriniwanpama) budurajananwahansege thewana lankagamana (buddhathwayen 8 weni wasare kalaniyata) sumana saman dewiyange aaradhanayen samanala sirasa matha shripadaya pihituwima budurajananwahanse kimbaulwath nuwarata wadama kirima agra upasthayaka wu aananda himiyange parinirwanaya ruwanwali maha saye wada aarambhakirima wijayagamanaya - wijaya kumaru 700k pirisa samanga diwayinata godabasima dewanapathis rajuge dewana abhishekaya poson pohoya (juni) mihinduhimige prathama dharmadeshanaya(dewanampiyathissa rajathuma athulu 40000ka pirisakata chullahasthipadopama suthraya deshana kirima) lakdiwa prathama mahana upasampadawa asala pohoya (juli) siduhath kumaru mawkusa pilisindaganima rahula kumaruge upatha kisagothamiya wisin nibbutha pada kima prathama dharmadeshanaya (damsak pawathum deshanawa) budusasune prathama wassupagamanaya gandabba ruk muladi thirthakayange manaya bindimata yamamaha pelahara pama thawthisa dewlowadi mathru diwya puthraya pradhana dewiyanta abhidharmaya deshana kirima prathama dharma sangayanawa sandaha wadakatayuthu aarambha kirima (buddha parinirwanayen themasakata pasu maha kashyapa rahathanwahanse pradhana rahathanwahansela 500kage sahabhagithwayen saha ajasath rajuge dayakathwayen) lakdiwa prathama khanda simawa sammatha kirima aritta kumaru athulu 50 deneku pawadiwima ha upasampadawa mihindu himi athulu hata denamak lakdiwa waswisima (lakdiwa prathama wassupagamanaya) kantaka chaithyaya wata karawu atasata len pujawa ruwanwali sa radunta mulgala thabima ruwanwali saye dhathu nidhanaya wiharasthanawala was aaradhanaya mahanuwara dalada perahare aarambhaya katharagama asala perahara siyam maha nikaye upasampadawa aarambha kirima (kirthi shri rajasinha rajathuma siyam raten upali therun athulu sanghaya genwagena) nikini pohoya (agosthu) pasu was elambaima (asala poya dina was samadanwimata nohaki wu bhikshun wahansela wassamadanwima) dharma bhandagarika saha agra upasthayaka lesa nam daru aananda himiyan rahathwima prathama dharma sangayanawa aarambhakirima binara pohoya (sapthambar) bhikshuni sasanaya aarambha kirima wap pohoya (okthobar) budurajananwahanse thawthisawe sita sankassa nuwarata wadamawima maithri bodhisathwayan pawadiwima sariyuth himiyanta pragnyawen aga thanathura pradhanaya kirima sanghamiththa theraniya wadamawimata aritta amathiwaraya indiyawata pitathwima mihindu himige anudanuma athiwa maharitta maharahathanwahanse wisin thuparamayedi winaya pitakaya sangayana kirima jaya shrimaha bodhi ankuraya pihitawima was pawaranaya kirima saha katina pinkam aarambha kirima il pohoya (nowambar) prathama dharmadutha sewaya lesa rahathanwahansela 60 namak dharma pracharaya arambaima budurajananwahanse thun ba jatilayan wetha wadamawima maithri bodhisathwayan wiwarana labaganima sariyuth himiyange maniyan sowan margapalayata paminima sariyuth himiyan piriniwan pama mahindagamanayen pasu prathama dagaba wu thuparamaya idikirima arambaima awasana katina puja dinaya (chiwara masaye awasana poya dinaya) saha pasu was samadan wu bhikshun wahansela was pawaranaya kirima (unwahansela katina chiwara bharaganne natha.)
